name: Alien captain
descriptions: The alien captain is the commander-in-chief of Mothership Zeta in 2277. It serves as the main antagonist of the add-on.

The alien captain is the leader of the alien forces on Mothership Zeta, equipped with a shiny Captain's Sidearm and a shiny gray spacesuit. As the ship's captain, it has access to the defensive and offensive systems of Mothership Zeta - the shields and death ray respectively.
The Lone Wanderer refers to the alien captain as "he."
The alien captain appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.
